item.title: Todos os olhos no Hospital al-Shifa: último hopital funcional em Gaza parcialmente evacuado e em ruínas; Sumud Flotilla atacada por drones
item.description: No medicine, no beds, no food or water: inside Gaza City’s main hospital {.wp-block-heading} As the Israeli invasion of Gaza City advances, al-Shifa Hospital is facing severe shortages of essential medical supplies, leaving patients untreated and vulnerable. Staff and patients fear an imminent Israeli attack. https://mondoweiss.net/2025/09/no-medicine-no-beds-no-food-or-water-inside-gaza-citys-main-hospital/ A view of al-Shifa Hospital, left empty after medical staff and patients were forced to evacuate due to intensified Israeli attacks in Gaza City, Gaza, on September 25, 2025.
